榾榾榾

榾字的基本解释

榾
gù
〔榾柮（
du?）〕断木头，如“榾榾无烟雪夜长，地炉煨酒暧如汤。”

榾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǔ］
［《廣韻》古忽切，入没，見。］
(1)指砍掉树干所剩下的连着根的部分。
(2)见“榾榾”。

榾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第14
【唐韻】【集韻】古忽切，音骨。【玉篇】枸榾木，中箭笴。【本草圖經】作狗骨木，體白似骨，故名。南人取以作合器，甚佳。

榾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榾字的起名意思

暂无。

scrap of wood
Basic explanation of words
scrap of wood
gù
〔榾柮(
du?)] Broken wood, such as "Lin 榾 has a long smoke-free snow night, and the furnace simmers the wine as hot as soup."
scrap of wood
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [gǔ]
["Guangyun" ancient suddenly cuts, enters and disappears, see. ]
(1) Refers to the part connected to the roots that is left after cutting the trunk.
(2) See "榾榾".
scrap of wood
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Suddenly cut in ancient times, sound bone. [Jade articles] citron wood, in the arrow. [This sketch book] is made of dog bone wood, white as bone, hence the name. The southerners use it as a combiner, which is very good.
scrap of wood
